channel.title: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!

item.title: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[quote=“Paintball199, post:17, topic:138328”]if(playerRights >= 2) { if(PlayerHandler.playerCount > 18 { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = false; } else { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; } }
Fixed ftw?[/quote]

Not fixed ftw? You’re missing a parenthesis and that mean’s it’ll only keep people with 2 or higher off …

if(PlayerHandler.playerCount > 18 && playerRights <= 1) { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = false; }

Read full topic
item.source: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!

item.title: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!

@Paintball199 wrote:

if(playerRights >= 2) { if(PlayerHandler.playerCount > 18 { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = false; } else { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; } }
Fixed ftw?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!
item.dc:creator: @Whitey_b Whitey b
item.description:
@Whitey_b wrote:

if (playerCount > 18 && playerRights < 2) { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; } else { returnCode = 2; disconnected = false; }
Quest, you need the returnCode = 2, thats for a succesful login.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!

item.title: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

or if you wish to shorten your code a little try:

if((playerRights <= 1) && (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 18)) { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; } else { disconnected = false; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Try:

if((playerRights == 1 || playerRights == 0) && (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 18)) { returnCode = 7; savefile = false; disconnected = true; } else { disconnected = false; } }

item.title: Help me fix this and I will make you admin on AWESOMEPK!
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Change it so if you are player right 0 you disconnect, and else disconnect = false;

something like

if((playerright=0 ) & (PlayerHandler.playerCount > 18))
{
returnCode = 7;
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
}
else
{
disconected = false;
}

Read full topic
